events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund because this is not what I paid for.
The case has been categorized under the Refund cluster based on the customer's request for money back.
An agent from the refund team has been assigned to handle the customer's request regarding the incorrect item.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear about the issue with your order. I’m here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify the issue?
Sure, my order number is 123456789, and I have attached a clear photo showing the wrong product I received.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate the refund immediately, and you should see the amount credited back to your account within 5-7 business days.
I appreciate the quick response and the clear explanation. I am happy to proceed with the refund as you outlined.
The refund has been processed successfully. Please check your bank statement in the coming days and contact us if you have any further questions.
Just following up to ensure you received your refund and to see if there is anything else we can assist you with today.
Yes, I received the refund in my account yesterday. Thank you very much for your support.
We are closing this case now as the refund has been successfully completed and the customer has confirmed receipt.
A customer satisfaction survey has been sent to gather feedback about the refund process and overall service experience.
